name: Criminal Behavior Analysis
description: Techniques for analyzing criminal behavior and psychological motivations.

cards.title: Deception Patterns in Criminal Behavior
cards.description: Identifying lies, inconsistencies, and deceptive behaviors in suspects.
bulletpoints: Analyze microexpressions and body language for deception
Use linguistic cues to detect inconsistencies in statements
Apply cognitive load techniques to expose lies

cards.title: Traits of Serial Offenders & Recidivists
cards.description: Examining patterns of repeat offenders and serial criminals.
bulletpoints: Profile the psychological motivators of serial offenders
Differentiate between organized and disorganized criminal behavior
Use behavioral pattern recognition for threat prediction
